name: Ni no Kuni: Dominion of the Dark Djinn
name_original: Ni no Kuni: Dominion of the Dark Djinn
description:
Ni no Kuni: Dominion of the Dark Djinn is a RPG game developed by Level 5. It was originally released in 2010. It was published by Level-5. The game is rated as "Skip" on RAWG.
Ni no Kuni: Dominion of the Dark Djinn is available on Nintendo DS.
It was produced by Hiroyuki Watanabe. It was directed by Ken Motomura. Joe Hisaishi and Rei Kondoh scored the game.
